about_the_game:
With this skin pack, you can unlock five new skins that can be applied to blocks in Trailmakers to alter their appearance: Camouflage, Brick, Wood, Glow and Metallic. It is still possible to change the color of blocks that have these skins equipped - so you can get the metallic sheen you want, or the glow to be the color you want, for instance.

The skins can be applied to the following blocks:

The skins can be applied to the following blocks: Block 1x2, Block 1x3, Block 1x4, Block 2x4, Block 2x2x2, Block 4x8, Cylinder 1x1x2, Shield Plates, all the blocks in the Aerodynamic Category as well as all Hull Blocks.

Please note that these skins are only cosmetic in nature, and do not alter the physical properties of blocks in the game. Players who do not own the Skin Pack cannot edit vehicles that use these skins without purchasing the Skin Pack for themselves, but will still be able to drive vehicles with these skins equipped if spawned in by a player who owns the Skin Pack.

In addition to making your builds pop, buying the Skin Pack also supports the continued development of Trailmakers and future games from Flashbulb Games. Thank you for supporting us!
